alert.note: Alert for Central Oregon; East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades; Ochoco-John Day Highlands (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 12:41PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Crook and central Deschutes Counties through 115 PM PDT... At 1240 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles east of Sunriver to 6 miles east of Millican to 10 miles northeast of Hampton. Movement was north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bend, Redmond, Prineville, Brothers, Tumalo, Post, Sunriver, Paulina, Alfalfa, Hampton, Deschutes River Woods, Millican and Powell Butte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Oregon; East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades; Ochoco-John Day Highlands
